input.sentences: a huge papa smurf that had been made for the festivities arrived at the scene .
it was very heavy and several people had to help unload it off the back of the truck .
papa smurf was set up behind the chairs for the audience .
this mom and her two daughters were excited to be there and take part in the celebration .
there was a large bonfire built to help keep the attendees warm .
output.sentences: A smurf was noticed at the scene of the crime, specifically Papa Smurf.
He was being unloaded from the bed of a truck by a small group of people.
The smurf was set in the middle of a group of cultists, all watching the sacrifice taking place with Papa.
A mom was clearly excited, along with her two daughters to be a part of the festivities.
After the sacrificing, the ambience was warm, and people built a bonfire to continue the pagan celebrations.
